name: World Wide Hack
storyline:
During the quantum computing experiments a research company discovered the existence of something strange. The researchers got an idea and proposed very dangerous and risky plan. They decided to provide social experiment which should enable a progress and success of our own world. Story of the game is full of controversial opinions and views on the answers to question: “What is really the proper direction for the society and the whole world?”

You hack into the leaked system of QuanTech company and, with other hackers, reveal their secrets while exploring experimental open-world networks.

Manipulate corporations' and inhabitants' lives by hacking their computers, observe the consequences of your actions and decide if you want to protect or exploit this world.

Find out how easily some can manipulate many and how powerful but dangerous control over the information can be...
summary: World Wide Hack is an MMO simulation game about realistic hacking and cybersecurity. Collect the most effective sets of hacking and security tools, gather assets, and improve your computer to hack others, control parts of the network, or create the best websites and tools which will help other hackers and make you rich! Work with others to make your experimental activities useful for your faction and lead with them the world in the right direction.
